body_html:
I meet same problem.
I specify the cpu
strategy = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(
['/device:CPU:0', '/device:GPU:0', '/device:GPU:1'])
the code can be run
but GPU:0 Util more than 90%
GPU:1 Util is lower

body:
I meet same problem.
I specify the cpu
strategy = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(
   ['/device:CPU:0', '/device:GPU:0', '/device:GPU:1'])
the code can be run
but GPU:0 Util more than 90%
GPU:1 Util is lower
